Articles.Content:
This is a thread for me to post my art, you guys to post your art, and to KINDLY AND RESPECTFULLY judge eachothers art! i might even take requests once in a while

I do make music but i'd rather not share my youtube on here, but at the same time i wanna share my music :(((

The thread is updated monthly  bi-weekly with any other drawings i might have made

now bask in the gloriousness of my drawings!

On 2/23/2021 at 12:50 AM, Souptime said:

what do you think i use the soup inside me for?

It took me so long to make this yall petter appreciate it

this is canon the the [?]time lore

 

On 2/24/2021 at 12:06 AM, Souptime said:

so im making a series of drawings called "Shimmering aurorae", they are meant to be practice peices as i get better. But i have a really good looking one in my head but i just cant get it onto drawing. You know that? just something amazing in your head that u can replicate but just cant?

what do yall think?

Here 1:

Heres 2:

I know i'll get better when i get a drawing pad, but i gotta use a mouse right now

i made anoder what do yall think

U can make atmospheric hazing by creating a s l i g h t l y blue version of that color, so its look like a pseudo 3d style

On 3/27/2021 at 9:41 AM, OrdinaryKerman said:

Version 2:


Based on plans by Aidan Wilkinson of the TARDIS Builder forums: tardisbuilders.com/topic10051.0, TV design by Arwel Wyn Jones based on previous TV TARDISes by Tom Yardley-Jones 1980 and Colin Richmond 2004 & 2010, based on the Metropolitan Police Box Mk2 by Gilbert MacKenzie-Trench 1928/1929

Quote

without minor colour grade on box

Click for previous, more blurry version

Version 2 of the TARDIS renders, now with a more screen-accurate box, atmospheric effects, PBR materials, and a new backdrop with a little hut in the back. Which one looks better? Should I tone down the depth of field effect in this one?

 

Edited April 24, 2021 by OrdinaryKerman

Original model from @Kartoffelkuchen's eponymous joke mod Grandma's original Kartoffelkuchen, added detail by me.

Apparently that pie is made of potato flour and mashed potatoes, with some sausages and assorted spices
